db.data: 201C;LEFT DOUBLE QUOTATION MARK;Pi;0;ON;;;;;N;DOUBLE TURNED COMMA QUOTATION MARK;;;;;;;567;1.1

desc.data: ¶= double turned comma quotation mark¶• this is the preferred character (as opposed to 201F)¶→ (quotation mark - 0022)¶→ (heavy double turned comma quotation mark ornament - 275D)¶→ (reversed double prime quotation mark - 301D)
